projects.name: shopping-cart
projects.description: My first attempt to understand Redux. A simple online store. The site is under production.

projects.name: dorfin
projects.description: A static website created for a tax consultancy company. This is also my first site created in Gatsby.

projects.name: GerenQ
projects.description: An educational application that is intended to be a learning aid in the form of a quiz for students. The user gets access to a database of many subjects, sections and questions.The project is under development

projects.name: Oddam w dobre rÄ™ce
projects.description: This is a website made as part of the Coders Lab course. The site is used to create a place where everyone can give unused items to trusted institutions. After logging in, we have access to a form which is to allow users to return items. If you do not want to register - login: test@text.com, password: testpassword.

projects.name: weather-app
projects.description: One of my first projects in React. A simple application that allows you to get current weather data after entering a specific city.

projects.name: react-chess
projects.description: My first big project in React. An application that is to allow a chess game with the computer (chess engine). Currently, I prefer to focus on other things, but I will definitely finish it in the future.
